title: Conjuration Spells
content: onjuration ActionSpell Slot Summon a familiar with the form and statistics of an imp. Its barbed tail can inject enemies with a potent poison.18m Warlock Find Familiar: Quasit Lv 1 Conjuration Action Spell Slot Summon a familiar with the form and statistics of a quasit that can frighten enemies.18m Warlock Find Familiar: Rat Lv 1 Conjuration ActionSpell Slot Summon a familiar with the form and statistics of a rat. Its infectious bite can spread disease. (Lasts until the end of a long rest)18m Wi
